entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mackenzie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -20.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mackenzie Airport 03:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -20.6°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 46 %

Dewpoint: -29.2°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023
